parameters.name: PitchMethod
parameters.description: Pitch method as defined in swChainPatternPitchMethod_e ; available for all types of chain patterns

parameters.name: FlipDirection
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the chain pattern, false to not; available for all types of chain patterns

parameters.name: FillPath
parameters.description: True to automatically set the number of pattern instances to fill the path, false to not; available for all types of chain patterns and when EqualSpacing is false for distance and linkage distance chain patterns

parameters.name: Number
parameters.description: Number of pattern instances; available for all types of chain patterns when FillPath is false

parameters.name: Spacing
parameters.description: Distance between the pattern instances when EqualSpacing is false; only available for distance and linkage distance chain patterns when EqualSpacing is false

parameters.name: GroupOneFlipPlane
parameters.description: True to flip the path alignment plane for Chain Group 1 , false to not; available for all types of chain patterns

parameters.name: GroupTwoChain
parameters.description: True to set the component to pattern for Chain Group 2 , false to not; only available for connected linkage chain patterns

parameters.name: GroupTwoFlipPlane
parameters.description: True to flip the path alignment plane for Chain Group 2 , false to not; only available for connected linkage chain patterns

parameters.name: AlignMethod
parameters.description: Alignment method as defined in swChainPatternAlignment_e ; only available for distance and linkage distance chain patterns

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Option as defined in swChainPatternOptions_e ; available for all types of chain patterns

title: IFeatureManager.FeatureChainPattern
description: Obsolete. See IFeatureManager::CreateFeature and the Remarks in IChainPatternFeatureData.

parameters.name: PitchMethod
parameters.description: Pitch method as defined in swChainPatternPitchMethod_e ; available for all types of chain patterns

parameters.name: FlipDirection
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the chain pattern, false to not; available for all types of chain patterns

parameters.name: FillPath
parameters.description: True to automatically set the number of pattern instances to fill the path, false to not; available for all types of chain patterns and when EqualSpacing is false for distance and linkage distance chain patterns

parameters.name: Number
parameters.description: Number of pattern instances; available for all types of chain patterns when FillPath is false

parameters.name: Spacing
parameters.description: Distance between the pattern instances when EqualSpacing is false; only available for distance and linkage distance chain patterns when EqualSpacing is false

parameters.name: GroupOneFlipPlane
parameters.description: True to flip the path alignment plane for Chain Group 1 , false to not; available for all types of chain patterns

parameters.name: GroupTwoChain
parameters.description: True to set the component to pattern for Chain Group 2 , false to not; only available for connected linkage chain patterns

parameters.name: GroupTwoFlipPlane
parameters.description: True to flip the path alignment plane for Chain Group 2 , false to not; only available for connected linkage chain patterns

parameters.name: AlignMethod
parameters.description: Alignment method as defined in swChainPatternAlignment_e ; only available for distance and linkage distance chain patterns

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Option as defined in swChainPatternOptions_e ; available for all types of chain patterns

remarks:
You must pre-select the entities for the chain pattern feature. Using the selected entities, this method inserts one of these chain pattern features:
distance
distance linkage
connected linkage
